org.fcrepo.indexer.solr

Class SolrIndexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.indexer.AsynchIndexer<NamedFields,org.apache.solr.client.solrj.response.UpdateResponse>
      • org.fcrepo.indexer.solr.SolrIndexer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Indexer<NamedFields>

    public class SolrIndexer
extends AsynchIndexer<NamedFields,org.apache.solr.client.solrj.response.UpdateResponse>
    A Solr Indexer (stub) implementation that adds some basic information to a Solr index server.
    Since:
    Nov 2013
    Author:
    ajs6f, yecao
